english_example_sentence: If we catch fish with a big net, we would be very happy.
russian_example_sentence: Если мы поймаем рыбу большой сетью, мы будем очень счастливы.
turkish_example_sentence: Büyük bir ağ ile balık tutsak, çok seviniriz.
